==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Ielmini is a Meropide [[guard]] that works for Wriothesley. He helps the Traveler uncover the scheme involving the [[Beret Society]]. He also helps Wriothesley round up and arrest [[Aucelet]] and other criminals part of the scheme.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|It's What He Deserves}}</ref>
